name: Survive Zombies
description:
Survive Zombies is an Arcade-Style shooter where player needs to collect antidotes and safe survivors during his way to fight zombies that comes in different sizes and strength.
Player has several different weapons to defend himself with all having different shooting power.
extra ammo can be obtained after shooting the zombies that will leave ammo and extra health from time to time.
game has 5 different levels to survive to and comes with 3 options of difficulty.
